messages.subject: David's books
messages.msgSnippet: We just added a David Gutterson book to our arsenal of unschooling/natural learning materials for our resource table at the weekly group get together. What a
messages.messageBody:
We just added a David Gutterson book to our arsenal of unschooling/natural
learning materials for our resource table at the weekly group get together.
What a voice! The very first thing that caught my eye was how school is such
a driving force in our society...I'll have to read more later.
It will be a big help to the families coming to our group for information....

Ren
"The world's much smaller than you think. Made up of two kinds of
people--simple and complicated.....The simple ones are contented. The
complicated ones aren't."
"Unschooling support at pensacolaunschoolers.com
